name: Where is Teddy? <127.0.0.1>
description:
A Multiplayer Block Puzzle Game you must complete alone. 

Instructions

  • Mouse controls for "OS"
  • WASD to move
  • R to reset level
  • If you get stuck try opening up the "Hack"

Created during the Mini Jam 121:Reflection. Only 72 hours were available to develop the game and it required using the concept of a window as a core part of the game.
